abstract: Cafe Un Deuz Trois restaurant on West 44th Street in Manhattan has for last 30 years featured Christmas carols during dinners on Wednesday, Friday and Saturday in final three weeks of December; many regulars say part of draw to restaurant is waiter Michael Pollard, who plays concert master for caroling.
lead_paragraph: Michael Pollard is the star of a Christmas tradition at Café Un Deux Trois, leading patrons of the Manhattan restaurant in a boisterous rendition of “The 12 Days of Christmas.”

headline.main: A Waiter Who Serves Up Food, Drinks and a Classic Holiday Song
headline.print_headline: Big Draw for Holidays Isn’t Found on Menu

snippet: Michael Pollard is the star of a Christmas tradition at Café Un Deux Trois, leading patrons of the Manhattan restaurant in a boisterous rendition of “The 12 Days of Christmas.”
